overview: Dr. Molly Feels has a very successful radio talk show where she gives sex advice to her listeners. The listeners call in and share recent sexual events with the doctor and get her feedback. After she experiences her own tale of lust and heartbreak, she decides to bring a guest into the studio, Dr. Jack Romance, a divorce relationship expert. Little does she know, he listens to her show whenever he can and is a big fan of hers.
tagline: A Sensual Tale of Love & Lust is on the Air.
title: Love on the Line
